*************************
ODPI-C Private Structures
*************************

The following structures are private structures used within ODPI-C and are not
intended to be used by any other code. They are subject to change at any point,
without warning. They are documented here for completeness and to provide
insight into the design used by ODPI-C.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1

    dpiBindVar<dpiBindVar.rst>
    dpiConn<dpiConn.rst>

    dpiDynamicBytes<dpiDynamicBytes.rst>
    dpiDynamicBytesChunk<dpiDynamicBytesChunk.rst>
    dpiEnqOptions<dpiEnqOptions.rst>
    dpiEnv<dpiEnv.rst>
    dpiError<dpiError.rst>
    dpiErrorBuffer<dpiErrorBuffer.rst>
    dpiLob<dpiLob.rst>
    dpiMsgProps<dpiMsgProps.rst>
    dpiObject<dpiObject.rst>
    dpiObjectAttr<dpiObjectAttr.rst>
    dpiObjectType<dpiObjectType.rst>
    dpiOracleType<dpiOracleType.rst>
    dpiPool<dpiPool.rst>
    dpiRowid<dpiRowid.rst>
    dpiStmt<dpiStmt.rst>
    dpiSubscr<dpiSubscr.rst>
    dpiTypeDef<dpiTypeDef.rst>
    dpiVar<dpiVar.rst>
